alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 11:02PM CDT until June 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in central Kansas... Northern Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Russell County in central Kansas... Northern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1058 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Asherville to near Codell, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russell, Wilson, Lincoln, Lucas, Gorham, Sylvan Grove, Luray, Dorrance, Beverly, New Cambria, Barnard, Milberger, Glendale, Bunker Hill, Paradise, Waldo, Ash Grove, Westfall, Russell Airport and Wilson State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 near Mile Marker 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 175 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
